me dawaswala lankawe prashnayak nathi wishwa widyalayak hoyaganna nathi tharam.waraduna....moratuwa,yapanaya ha nagenahira wishwa widyala wala nam danata prashna na.moratuwa aayonta gon prashna athi karagannawata wada karanna wada thiyenawa.yapanaya ha nagenahira inna bahutharaya ape drawida sahodarayo..ee udawiyath me wage gon part wada danna yanne na.....ethakota anith wi.wi wala inna undalata mokada wela thiyenne.ee gana mama mage mullata wela thatta thaniyame inna kota hithichcha dewal saha makulu dale rawum gahanakota dakka dewal gana thama me liyanne.........shri lankawe wishwa widyala 16k thiyenawa.eeta amatharawa wiwidhakaraye upadhi pirinamana aayathana 15k thiyenawa.oonema nam methanin bala gannako ee monawada kiyala.(wikipidiya pituwata)ithin shri lankawe shishya prajawa a.po.sa sa.pe/u.pe ehema samathwela athi haki widihata oya usas adhyapana aayathana walata athul wela,ehema naththanam rata rajjayakata mangachchala upadhiyak mandu kora gannawa.kamak na.ugathamana shilpayamayi mathu rakena ne.dan api ape mathrukawata haremu.menna mekayi kathandare.peradeniya wishwa widyalayata thibba adupaduwak thama "nithi pitaya"(aththatama kiyanawanam "nithi adhyayananshaya") pawathwagena yamata adala godanagillak.mekata genawa wisanduma thama thibba godanagillak aluthwadiya karala ee sandaha pawichchiyata ganima.igena ganna oona ekata kothanath ekayi.bildima kohomahari supiri(kiwwata tikak adu) thathwayakata nima kara.aluth pitayak patan gannane yanne.ithin upakulapathithuma,pitadhipathithuma athulu pirisata oone wuna meka tikak lokuwata wiwrutha karanna.ee kiyanne uthsawakarayen wiwrutha karanna.aaradhana kara aluth usas adhyapana amathithumata.kawuda kiyala dannawane.kamak na.danne nathi kattiyata danagannath ekka kiyannam.ethuma thama athigaru
dipthige charithaya mata nirupanaya karanna puluwan da kiyala dawasak mata durakathanayen katha karala nalan mendis mahathmaya ahuwa.ohu mage kawa pej ekak dakala.
